Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Clay cuneiform tablet; letter from Adda-danu to the king (of Egypt).
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (292)
Pritchard 1950a / Ancient Near Eastern Texts relating to the Old Testament (pages 489-490)
Acquisition notes: According to Egyptian register purchased from Rustonitz but according to Trustees Minutes purchased from Kyticas on the 11th May 1902.
